<title level="1" right="Rules">[Triggering Snares](/Rules.aspx?ID=746)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 589 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Unless stated otherwise in a snare’s description, when a Small or larger creature enters a snare’s square, the snare’s effect occurs and then the snare is destroyed.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Triggering Snares
